channel.title: Action Button help?
channel.description:
Hey guys im running a 562 rs2hd and have decided to code some quests. First off in my quest tab you need to click a quest to see what Req u need ect and that window pops up telling you that stuff. How do i get that window to pop up? i know it has to do with actionbuttons.
?
